text: The 1982–83 season was Clydebank's seventeenth season after being elected to the Scottish Football League. They competed in Scottish League Division One where they finished 3rd. They also competed in the Scottish League Cup and Scottish Cup. ==Results== ===Division 1=== {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" ! Match Day ! Date ! Opponent ! H/A ! Score !
